meanings.definition: The state or quality of being irreparable.
meanings.sent1: The irreparablenesses of the broken vase made it impossible to restore.
meanings.sent2: The irreparablenesses of the old car meant it was beyond repair.
meanings.sent3: Despite his best efforts, the irreparablenesses of the situation left him feeling defeated.
meanings.sent4: The irreparablenesses of their friendship was like a shattered mirror, impossible to piece back together.
meanings.sent5: The irreparablenesses of the leak in the dam led to catastrophic flooding.

meanings.definition: The condition of being unable to be fixed or repaired.
meanings.sent1: The irreparablenesses of the torn painting saddened the art restorer.
meanings.sent2: The irreparablenesses of the computer's damage rendered it unusable.
meanings.sent3: The irreparablenesses of the situation made them laugh at the irony of it all.
meanings.sent4: The irreparablenesses of the rift between them felt like an insurmountable chasm.
meanings.sent5: The irreparablenesses of the mistake cost them the championship title.
